mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, serial_number AS serialNumber, switch_index AS switchIndex, switch_sn AS switchSn, s_year AS year, s_month AS month, s_day AS day, AVG(${tableName}) AS data, project_id AS projectId FROM pc_${tableName}_hours WHERE s_year = #{year} AND s_month = #{month} AND s_day = #{day} GROUP BY serial_number,switch_sn,project_id, user_id
